columns.name: workload_name
columns.description: The name of the workload.

columns.name: workload_arn
columns.description: The ARN for the workload.

columns.name: workload_id
columns.description: The ID assigned to the workload.

columns.name: architectural_design
columns.description: The URL of the architectural design for the workload.

columns.name: description
columns.description: The description for the workload.

columns.name: environment
columns.description: The environment for the workload.

columns.name: improvement_status
columns.description: The improvement status for a workload.

columns.name: industry
columns.description: The industry for the workload.

columns.name: industry_type
columns.description: The industry type for the workload.

columns.name: is_review_owner_update_acknowledged
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the workload owner has acknowledged that the review owner field is required.

columns.name: notes
columns.description: The notes associated with the workload.

columns.name: owner
columns.description: An AWS account ID.

columns.name: review_owner
columns.description: The review owner of the workload.

columns.name: review_restriction_date
columns.description: The date and time recorded.

columns.name: share_invitation_id
columns.description: The ID assigned to the share invitation.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: The date and time recorded.

columns.name: account_ids
columns.description: The list of AWS account IDs associated with the workload.

columns.name: aws_regions
columns.description: The list of AWS Regions associated with the workload, for example, us-east-2, or ca-central-1.

columns.name: lenses
columns.description: The list of lenses associated with the workload. Each lens is identified by its LensSummary$LensAlias.

columns.name: non_aws_regions
columns.description: The list of non-AWS Regions associated with the workload.

columns.name: pillar_priorities
columns.description: The priorities of the pillars, which are used to order items in the improvement plan.

columns.name: risk_counts
columns.description: A map from risk names to the count of how questions have that rating.
